metadata.title: In the Shadow of Two Gunmen (Part I)
metadata.time_reference: Immediate aftermath of an assassination attempt on President Bartlet

notes: Episode is a two-part season premiere following an assassination attempt on President Bartlet.
Focuses on the immediate response and flashbacks to how the team came together.

ratings_millions.part: In the Shadow of Two Gunmen (Part I)

continuity_notes: Continues the storyline from Season 1 finale.
Establishes key character backstories through flashbacks.

plot.plot_summary: In the chaotic aftermath of an assassination attempt on President Bartlet, his staff races to manage the crisis while dealing with their own injuries. Flashbacks reveal how Bartlet's team formed during his presidential campaign.
